solution_line_template: Since Kenneth spent {spent_percent}%, then he is left with {total_percent}% - {spent_percent}% = {left_percent}% of his earnings.
Since {left_percent}% of his earnings is worth ${left_amount}, then 1% of his earnings is ${left_amount}/{left_percent} = $<<{left_amount}/{left_percent}={one_percent_value}>>{one_percent_value}.
